properties.title: Jet d'eau (water fountain)
properties.abstract: If weather permits it, it is possible to admire the Water Fountain (Jet d'eau), symbol of Geneva. The water is projected from the nozzle at a speed of 200 kilometres per hour and it reaches a height of approximately 140 meters. This represents a mass of seven tons of water hanging in the air.
properties.description:
The first Water Fountain was several hundred meters downstream and served as a safety valve relieving the water pressure after the closing time of the numerous workshops depending on the hydroelectric plant of the Coulouvrenière.

After it became a tourist attraction, it was transferred to the harbour in 1891.
properties.name: Fondation Genève Tourisme & Congrès
